Description
Attacks
  • Languages: Understands Common and Draconic but can't speak.
  • Pact of the Chain: If dropped to 0 HP, the familiar disappears, leaving behind no physical form. It must obey all commands of the master.
Features
  • Keen Senses: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing or smell.
  • Magic Resistance: The pseudodragon has advantage saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
  • Limited Telepathy: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions and images telepathically with any creature within 100ft. of it that can understand a language.
